name: Bounce'it
description:
What is Bounce'it? 

Bounce'it is a 2d physics game where you must keep bouncing the spikey ball in the air to score points. If you let the spikey ball hit the ground the game will end, how many points can you score!

How to play? 

To keep the spikey ball in the air, you'll have to use the left and right arrow keys to move. Well that's about it, have fun!
